title: The Mandie Collection, Volume 1
description: This five-in-one volume brings MANDIE fans--new and old alike--back to where it all began. Readers will discover anew the charms of the impulsive Mandie Shaw as she faces the ups and downs of first losing her father and then finding her long-lost family in Mandie and the Secret Tunnel . Many more mysteries follow for Mandie and her friends in Mandie and the Cherokee Legend , Mandie and the Ghost Bandits , Mandie and the Forbidden Attic , and Mandie and the Trunk's Secret .
author: Lois Gladys Leppard
